name: Disco King
description:
Description

2 PLAYERS GAME

WHO WILL BECOME THE DISCO KING?

2 dancers will be competing for the throne.

To become the winner, you will have to follow the path displayed on the dance floor. However the path will be visible for a few seconds, memorize it or you will be stunned.

Technology used

Adobe series: Illustrator, Photoshop, Audition, flash

Code: AS3

Help / Controls

Directions Keys to move the dancer

Creators

Code: Marc Bernard,Olivier Large & Mallory Agoumba

Sound design: Hakim Belhadi & Louis Henriot

Graphics: Mégane Robert, Adam Bouali & Clément Ballanger

Integration: Paul-Etienne Bardot
